internationalizations.description:
I've started my professional career in a far 2016 on a position of Systems Engineer / implementation Engineer and was involved in a continuous code development / deployments.

At present I have advanced knowledge on many DevOps stacks such as Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Nagios, Grafana. OpenSource projects deployments, applications development, building, testing and improvement - these are the number of skills every day I'm work with and in what I'm improving my abilities constantly.
